Token.Abstract: Provides a mechanism for computing secure one-way hashes from various data sources.
Computes an MD5 hash given an input string.

Parameter.Name: src
Parameter.Abstract: the string for which the MD5 will be computed

ReturnValue.Abstract: the MD5 hash, as binary NSData

Token.Abstract: Computes an MD5 hash given an input string.

Parameter.Name: src
Parameter.Abstract: the string for which the MD5 will be computed

ReturnValue.Abstract: the MD5 hash, as a lowercase hexadecimal string

Token.Abstract: Computes an MD5 hash from an NSData instance.

Parameter.Name: src
Parameter.Abstract: the data for which the MD5 will be computed

ReturnValue.Abstract: the MD5 hash, as a lowercase hexadecimal string

Token.Abstract: Computes an MD5 hash from an array of bytes.

Parameter.Name: bytes
Parameter.Abstract: the byte array for which the MD5 will be computed

Parameter.Name: len
Parameter.Abstract: the length of the byte array

ReturnValue.Abstract: the MD5 hash, as a lowercase hexadecimal string

Token.Abstract: Computes an MD5 hash for the contents of a file.

Parameter.Name: path
Parameter.Abstract: the filesystem path of the file for which the MD5 will be computed

Parameter.Name: errPtr
Parameter.Abstract: if an error occurs and this parameter is non-nil, the error will be stored here upon return

ReturnValue.Abstract: the MD5 hash, as a lowercase hexadecimal string; if an error occurs while attempting to read the file, nil is returned

Token.Abstract: Computes an MD5 hash for the contents of a file.

Parameter.Name: path
Parameter.Abstract: the filesystem path of the file for which the MD5 will be computed

ReturnValue.Abstract: the MD5 hash, as a lowercase hexadecimal string; if an error occurs while attempting to read the file, nil is returned

Token.Abstract: Computes an SHA-1 hash given an input string.

Parameter.Name: src
Parameter.Abstract: the string for which the SHA-1 will be computed

ReturnValue.Abstract: the SHA-1 hash, as binary NSData

Token.Abstract: Computes an SHA-1 hash given an input string.

Parameter.Name: src
Parameter.Abstract: the string for which the SHA-1 will be computed

ReturnValue.Abstract: the SHA-1 hash, as a lowercase hexadecimal string

Token.Abstract: Computes an SHA-1 hash from an NSData instance.

Parameter.Name: src
Parameter.Abstract: the data for which the SHA-1 will be computed

ReturnValue.Abstract: the SHA-1 hash, as a lowercase hexadecimal string

Token.Abstract: Computes an SHA-1 hash from an array of bytes.

Parameter.Name: bytes
Parameter.Abstract: the byte array for which the SHA-1 will be computed

Parameter.Name: len
Parameter.Abstract: the length of the byte array

ReturnValue.Abstract: the SHA-1 hash, as a lowercase hexadecimal string

Token.Abstract: Computes an SHA-1 hash for the contents of a file.

Parameter.Name: path
Parameter.Abstract: the filesystem path of the file for which the SHA-1 will be computed

Parameter.Name: errPtr
Parameter.Abstract: if an error occurs and this parameter is non-nil, the error will be stored here upon return

ReturnValue.Abstract: the SHA-1 hash, as a lowercase hexadecimal string; if an error occurs while attempting to read the file, nil is returned

Token.Abstract: Computes an SHA-1 hash for the contents of a file.

Parameter.Name: path
Parameter.Abstract: the filesystem path of the file for which the SHA-1 will be computed

ReturnValue.Abstract: the SHA-1 hash, as a lowercase hexadecimal string; if an error occurs while attempting to read the file, nil is returned
